comments.author: DaveF
comments.body: As has been discussed, these numbers are mostly pointless. You should not care about their assets. Without knowing what they are supposed to have.Having $100 is great, unless you owe 4 people $100. Then it's....not great.Having a lot of funds leave your exchange is bad. Unless is was a planned separation of a large client, then it's not important at all.Spitting out numbers without context and *all* the other data is pointless.-Dave

In the mean time, The table will just serve as a measurement for the inflow of assets on an exchange regardless of the specification of the tokens coincides. You can use the data to determine if the exchange is already crumbling which is an indication that they might exit the market like what happened to FTX and probably on crypto.com & coinbase
